text: was a Japanese diplomat. He was the Director General of the International Atomic Energy Agency (IAEA) from July 2009, until his death in July 2019. Amano was an international civil servant for the United Nations. Amano died on 18 July, 2019 at the age of 72. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Japanese diplomats Category:Kanagawa Prefecture Category:Liberal Democratic Party (Japan) politicians
title: Yukiya Amano
